attributes.action: Hold university offers for students wishing to sit exams in summer 2021
attributes.additional_details: We were promised results mid July but received them half way through August, a month and a half before the October exams. There is simply not enough time for students to do their best in October and this disproportionally effects students who can't pay for a private tutor. Every student should have a fair chance at getting the grades they deserve, going to the university they applied for and to be in control of their own future.
attributes.background: Work with UCAS to transfer this year's offers from university to next year for any student wanting to take their exams in summer 2021.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for the issue you raise. 

Individual universities are responsible for decisions about admissions. You could start a new petition calling for the Government to provide funding to universities for additional places for people who are resitting in 2021, if that's something that you'd like to see.
